metadata.name: Fishing in troubled waters
metadata.description:
"Fishing in troubled water" is a story of fishermen in our city. 
The photograph was taken on Damodar river during monsoon season.
The river during this time is filled bank to bank and is quite turbulent. These fishermen risk their life everyday for their livelihood.

As a photograph technically shows 3 layers of the water, the man with net & the platform on which he is standing. The 3 layers divided the frame in third rule while the shadow breaks the symmetry. 

Equipment - Nikon Gears
Location - Durgapur, India
Size - 2750X4000 @300PPI

Primary owner can request for bigger size printable digital copy as needed

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited.
